title.rendered: U.S. Embassy Wishes Ghanaian Muslims Eid Mubarak

content.rendered:
The Embassy of the United States of America in Accra would like to extend Eid greetings to Muslim communities in Ghana. Ramadan has been a time for families and communities to share the happiness of coming together in intense devotion, reflection, and service. The United States reaffirms its commitment to Ghana in its developmental efforts for the mutual benefit of both countries.

As Ramadan comes to an end, we extend our best wishes for a blessed holiday to Muslim communities across the country. Eid Mubarak!
